info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 06 at 5:15PM MST until December 07 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulation less than one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Northern High Plains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 PM MST this evening. For the Blizzard Warning, from Midnight tonight to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions through this evening. Then strong winds are expected to develop tonight into Wednesday and cause extensive blowing and drifting of snow. Whiteout conditions will cause dangerous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow through this evening will likely stay confined to the US Highway 89 corridor south of US Highway 2.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
